trans-unit.source: When applied to a <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly> object, enables an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AssemblyCatalog"></xref> object to discover custom <xref:System.Reflection.ReflectionContext> objects.
trans-unit.target: Ha alkalmazza a <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>objektum, lehetővé teszi, hogy egy <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AssemblyCatalog"> </xref> objektum egyéni felderítésére <xref:System.Reflection.ReflectionContext>objektumok.</xref:System.Reflection.ReflectionContext> </xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AssemblyCatalog"></xref> class with the specified <xref:System.Reflection.ReflectionContext> type.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AssemblyCatalog"> </xref> és a megadott osztály <xref:System.Reflection.ReflectionContext>típusa.</xref:System.Reflection.ReflectionContext>

trans-unit.source: The type of the reflection context.
Creates an instance of the custom <xref:System.Reflection.ReflectionContext> object.
An instance of the custom reflection context.
